initial_message: 2 papers accepted at ICCV 2021. The continuation of our work on MCTS for scene understanding has been accepted for an oral presentation, and our work on object discovery from videos as a poster. Congratulations Sinisa and Yuming!
we received the Best paper award at the CVPR2021 Workshop on Event-based Vision for our paper Detecting Stable Keypoints From Events Through Image Gradient Prediction, congratulations Philippe!
I will be an Area Chair for CVPR 2022

4 papers accepted at CVPR 2021. Check out our papers on extending MCTS to auto-labelling for 3D scene understanding and on Neural reprojection error for merging feature learning and camera pose estimation.
1 paper accepted at ACCV 2020, on 3D object pose estimation without training.
With my co-authors, I received the Koenderick 'test of time' award at ECCV 2020 for BRIEF! - I am very grateful to the awards committee.
I will be an Area Chair for ACCV 2020. Submission deadline is July 8, 2020.
I will be an Area Chair for ECCV 2020.
Head of the program committee for RFIAP 2020. Deadline is February 19, 2020. Submitted papers can be either in French or in English if the first author is a non-native French speaker.
message_after_date1: Head of the program committee for RFIAP 2020.
message_after_date2: Head of the program committee for RFIAP 2020.

initial_message: 3 papers accepted at 3DV'19: On 3D model retrieval from color images (Oral), accurate geolocalization in challenging conditions (Oral), and on the 3D pose estimation of symmetrical objects (Spotlight).
1 paper accepted at ICCV'19 on 3D object category pose estimation from color images.
1 paper accepted at MICCAI'19 on whole brain MRI segmentation.
Area Chair for ICCV 2019, BMVC 2019, and 3DV 2019.
1 paper accepted at CVPR'19 on SILC: corner point detection for Event-Based Cameras (based on .. Randomized Forests).
1 paper accepted at PAMI on joint hand-object pose estimation.
